title: Bug 108120Complete implemenation of runtime pointcut parsing and matching
description: Bug 108120Complete implemenation of runtime pointcut parsing and matching The weaver API for runtime pointcut parsing and matching needs extending for allof the new pointcuts we have added in AJ5. Recommended approach is to implementJavaLangReflectObjectType as a new ReferenceTypeDelegate, and aJavaLangReflectWorld in place of BcelWorld.
